column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////As far as the amount of broth in our ramen bowls is concerned
column2: our chefs use designated ladles to portion every bowl of ramen -- nothing is "eyeballed" or left to estimation. However
column3: if you add more noodles or additional toppings
column4: then the a certain amount of broth will often get absorbed into these toppings
column5: which is why we always suggest ordering extra broth in these cases.
